metadata.description: Provide the prefix (max 5 characters) to the management group hierarchy that will be created
Provide the location identifier prefix (3 characters)
Provide the PLatform Management Subscription identifier prefix (4 characters)
Provide the PLatform Identity Subscription identifier prefix (4 characters)
Provide the PLatform Connectivity Subscription identifier prefix (4 characters)
Provide the resource group identifier
Provide the log analytics identifier prefix
Provide the Azure Automation identifier prefix
Provide the Azure Storage identifier prefix
Provide the Azure Key Vault identifier prefix
Provide the Recovery Services Vault prefix
Provide the virtual network gateway identifier prefix
Provide the virtual Hub prefix
Provide the virtual WAN prefix
Provide the public IP identifier prefix
Provide the Azure Firewall identifier prefix
Provide the Route Table identifier prefix
Provide the Network Security Group identifier prefix
Provide the Azure Bastion prefix
Provide the value for the environment tag
Provide the value for the owner tag
Provide the value for the cost center tag
Provide the subscription id of an existing, empty subscription you want to dedicate for management. If you don't want to bring a subscription, leave this parameter empty as is.
Provide the subscription id of an existing, empty subscription you want to dedicate for identity.
Provide the subscription id of an existing, empty subscription you want to dedicate for networking.

If 'Yes' is selected when also adding a subscription for management, ARM will assign two policies to enable auditing in your environment, into the Log Analytics workspace for platform monitoring. If 'No', it will be ignored.

If 'Yes' is selected when also adding a subscription for management, ARM will assign two policies to enable auditing in your environment, into the Log Analytics workspace for platform monitoring. If 'No', it will be ignored.
Provide the Azure Security Center Email Contact
If 'Yes' is selected then an Azure Storage Account will be deployed.
If 'Yes' is selected then Long Term Retention to Storage will be enabled.
If 'Yes' is selected then a Recovery Services Vault will be deployed.

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of the Management Group structure
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').managementGroups]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Azure Policy Definitions at the root Management Group
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').policyDefinitions]

resources.comments: Move the Subscription to the appropriate Management Group or skip if not used. (Platform Management Subscription)
resources.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('managementSubscriptionId'))), variables('moveSubscription').management, variables('noSubscription').management)]

resources.comments: Move the Subscription to the appropriate Management Group or skip if not used. (Platform Identity Subscription)
resources.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('identitySubscriptionId'))), variables('moveSubscription').identity, variables('noSubscription').identity)]

resources.comments: Move the Subscription to the appropriate Management Group or skip if not used. (Platform Connectivity Subscription)
resources.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('connectivitySubscriptionId'))), variables('moveSubscription').connectivity, variables('noSubscription').connectivity)]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of a Log Analytics Workspace and Automation account in the Platform Management Subscription
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').monitoring]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Log Analytics Solutions in the Platform Subscription
resources.condition: [and(not(empty(parameters('managementSubscriptionId'))), or(or(or(or(or(equals(parameters('enableSecuritySolution'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableAgentHealth'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableChangeTracking'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableUpdateMgmt'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableActivityLog'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableAntiMalware'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableVmInsights'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableServiceMap'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableSqlAssessment'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableKeyVaultAnalytics'), 'Yes')))]
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').monitoringSolutions]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of a Recovery Services Vault for the Platform Identity Subscription
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').recoveryServicesVault]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of an Azure Storage account in the Platform Management Subscription
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').storage]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Identity & Access Management resources in the Platform Identity Subscription
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').identity]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Azure Policy Assignments for Landing Zone Subscriptions
resources.condition: [or(or(or(or(or(equals(parameters('denySubnetWithoutNsg'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('denyRdp'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('denyIpForwarding'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableSqlEncryption'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableSqlAudit'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableStorageHttps'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableAksPolicy'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('denyAksPrivileged'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('denyAksPrivilegedEscalation'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('denyHttpIngressForAks'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('denySsh'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('denyPrivateDnsZones'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('denyPip'), 'Yes'))]
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').landingZone]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Diagnostics and Security controls for the Platform Management Subscription
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').diagnosticsAndSecurity]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Network Connectivity resources in the Platform Connectivity Subscription
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').connectivity]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Private DNS resources in the Platform Connectivity Subscription
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').privateDns]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of the GitHub Repo for storing the current state of the Azure environment
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').azOps]

deployment.value: [concat(deployment().name, ' has successfully deployed. Welcome to Azure Foundations!')]
